entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
